body_html: Sounds good, today was a vacation day in the US so I was AFK. Will look at rolling forward a proper fix sometime this week. @gunan do we believe we have some target that'll fail if I introduce a dependency like this again? Didn't seem at submit time like anything was exploding in the CMake build, but I totally may have missed something. Happy to take any advice on making sure I do a properly tested fix, will try my darndest. :-)
